definition: theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe
round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)

sentences.english: The auspicious wish to work in the troupe, xiu-fang been feuding with reason.
sentences.chinese: 其祥希望在劇團工作，秀芳用藉口推搪。

sentences.english: Nancy:This theatre company is very avantgarde.
sentences.chinese: 這個戲劇團的演出非常前衛。

sentences.english: He had met a Bolshoi ensemble girl.
sentences.chinese: 他碰到“大劇院”劇團裏的一個姑娘。

sentences.english: Xiao Gang's brother plays the male role in the county opera troupe.
sentences.chinese: 小剛的哥哥是縣京劇團的小生演員。

sentences.english: A large group of chimpanzees was feeding.
sentences.chinese: 和業餘戲劇團一起演出可能是有趣的。

sentences.english: Now Kunqu troupes are trying to grab attention with provocative shows.
sentences.chinese: 現在各崑曲劇團試圖演出有噱頭的劇目來爭取關注。

sentences.english: This is the only major Luan Theater .
sentences.chinese: 這是全國唯一的專業亂彈劇團。

sentences.english: Kim Jong-il proofread the script over one hundred and fifty times.
sentences.chinese: 金正日同志一百五十多次親臨劇團指導改編。

sentences.english: During the Festival of Arts, I went to see a Beijing opera put up by a Shanghai troupe.
sentences.chinese: 藝術節的時候，我看了一出由上海某劇團演的京戲。

sentences.english: The triarch's grotesquerie is in need of a cyvasse-playing dwarf.
sentences.chinese: 元老的滑稽劇團正招聘回下cyvasse的侏儒呢。

sentences.english: Kapok is growing strong, just like the sturdy, silky flower.
sentences.chinese: 木棉劇團正在茁壯成長，就像美麗堅實的木棉花一樣。

sentences.english: Special thanks to Xin Qunying Opera Troupe allowing photo-taking at the backstage.
sentences.chinese: 特別鳴謝新羣英劇團容許在後臺拍照。

sentences.english: Andrea's dream is to perform in a national theater group.
sentences.chinese: 安德烈亞的夢想是在國際化的劇團演出。

sentences.english: She acted with a repertory company for three years.
sentences.chinese: 她在一個輪演劇目劇團裏上演三年。

sentences.english: Chaplin his childhood in the playground and itinerant troupes busk or odd jobs.
sentences.chinese: 卓別林，他的童年，在操場上和巡迴劇團賣藝或零工。

sentences.english: In his adopted country his family ran a Spanish operetta troupe.
sentences.chinese: 在他的第二祖國，家人經營一個西班牙輕歌劇團。

definition: to open/to start (a business etc)/to set up
to write and direct (a play, film etc)/playwright-director/choreographer-director/scenarist-director
to hold a governmental office or post/to assume office of/to take charge of/to serve as
script for play, opera, movie etc/screenplay/scenario
cast and crew/performers and production team
